lyrics_features.cleaned_text: Hey now, hey now, hey now, hey now It's finger pop poppin' time Finger poppin' poppin' time I feel so good Whoa, and that's a real good sign Hey now, hey now, hey now, hey now Hey baby, come along with me Hey, hey, hey baby Come along with me We're gonna shake it until it breaks Just wait and see Hey now, hey now, hey now, hey now It's finger pop poppin' time Finger poppin' poppin' time I feel so good And that's a real good sign Here comes Mary, here comes Sue Here come Johnny and Bobby too It's finger pop poppin' time I feel so good And that's a real good sign [Instrumental Interlude] Here comes Mary, here comes Sue Here come Johnny and Bobby too It's finger pop poppin' time I feel so good And that's a real good sign Hey now, hey now, hey now, hey now It's finger pop poppin' time Finger poppin' poppin' time I feel so good And that's a real good sign
